summary: A privately funded Danish mission to find resources on Saturn replaces navigator last minute with incompetent Per. His ex tries to warn them. Unfortunately, there are aliens on Saturn who are interested in Earth's water.
cast: Casper Christensen|Frank Hvam|Ali Kazim|Simon Jul Jørgensen|Iben Hjejle|Klaus Bondam|Peter Belli|Anders Lund Madsen|Lars Hjortshøj|Lasse Rimmer|Henrik Koefoed|Puk Scharbau|Kjeld Nørgaard|Jonas Schmidt|Rasmus Bjerg|Flemming Krøll|Tobias Dybvad|Esben Pretzmann|Claus Darholt|Craig Frank|Sidsel Rostrup|Tilde Landgreen|Ask Rostrup|Thorbjørn Christoffersen|Roberto Johansson|Jørgen Lerdam|Martin Wichmann Andersen|Kresten Vestbjerg Andersen|Karsten Kiilerich|Regitze Stampe|Morten Pilegaard|Bjarke Søballe Andersen|Tine Clasen|Justin Joseph Murphy|Carl-Mar Møller|Jon Nørgaard
keywords: denmark|crew|earth|reference to the holy spirit|cult film
title: Rejsen til Saturn
